name: sticky
description: Sticky is a self-hosted digital sticky note board for quick thoughts and collaborative lists. It offers drag-and-drop notes in a simple, colorful layout.
features: Digital sticky notes: Creates virtual sticky notes on shared board.
Drag-and-drop: Moves notes around board with mouse or touch.
Color coding: Assigns different colors to notes for visual organization.
Real-time collaboration: Sees changes from other users instantly.
Text formatting: Formats note text with basic styling options.
Board sharing: Shares boards with team members via links.
Note grouping: Organizes related notes into clusters.
Zoom and pan: Navigates large boards with zoom controls.
Export board: Saves board as image or PDF.
Mobile responsive: Creates and edits notes from smartphones.
No registration: Uses boards without creating accounts.
Keyboard shortcuts: Creates and manages notes efficiently with hotkeys.
